QuestData.Title: Ambushed!
QuestData.Description: As you turn around, you see the silhouettes of shambling skeletons on the stairs.$b$bThe undead aren't gone from this crypt. They were lying in wait! Furthermore, they appear to be armed with the weapons that you came looking for.$b$bYou'll have to escape from the crypt. On your way out, you should gather as many pieces of equipment as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 Time-Worn Breastplates and 4 Rusted Swords.
QuestData.RewardText: Attacked by ghosts? Strange. I suppose that crypt wasn't fully healed after all.$b$bYou just missed Thurman Grant... you remember, that oaf of a farmer that was here earlier. He took his men with him and traveled to the nearest farm... against my orders.
